name: v6.0.0.Beta2
body:
In this release:

- RESTEasy upgraded to `6.2.0.Final`
- SpringBoot upgraded to `3.0.0-M5`
- Jackson upgraded to `2.13.3`
- Springframework upgraded to `6.0.0-M6`
- [RESTEASY-3226 Adapt to new auto configuration support in spring boot](https://github.com/resteasy/resteasy-spring-boot/pull/186)

name: v5.1.0.Final
body:
In this release:

- `resteasy-spring.ver` = `2.0.0.Final`
- [Reactor Netty Server feature to 5.x branch](https://github.com/resteasy/resteasy-spring-boot/pull/184)

name: v6.0.0.Beta1
body:
In this release:

- Reactor Support is added: [Reactor Netty HTTP Server Support #169](https://github.com/resteasy/resteasy-spring-boot/pull/169)
- RESTEasy upgraded to `6.1.0.Final`
- RESTEasy Spring upgraded to `3.0.0.Beta1`
- SpringBoot upgraded to `3.0.0-M4`

name: v6.0.0.Alpha2
body:
In this release:

- [upgrade spring to `6.0.0-M4` · Issue #164 · resteasy/resteasy-spring-boot · GitHub](https://github.com/resteasy/resteasy-spring-boot/issues/164)
- [upgrade spring-boot to `3.0.0-M3` · Issue #163 · resteasy/resteasy-spring-boot · GitHub](https://github.com/resteasy/resteasy-spring-boot/issues/163)
- Fixed: [Unable to use resteasy-spring-boot-starter 6.0.0.Alpha1 · Issue #162 · resteasy/resteasy-spring-boot · GitHub](https://github.com/resteasy/resteasy-spring-boot/issues/162)
- `resteasy.ver` = `6.1.0.Beta1`

name: v6.0.0.Alpha1
body:
In this release:

- `resteasy.ver` = `6.0.0.Final`
- `resteasy.spring.ver` = `3.0.0.Alpha1`
- `springboot.ver` = `3.0.0-M1`
- Migrated to EE9 spec
- `PowerMock` is removed from tests.

name: v5.0.0.Beta1
body:
In this release:

- resteasy.ver = 5.0.0.Beta3
- springboot.ver = 2.5.6
- Multiple dependency upgrades

name: v4.8.1.Final
body:
In this release:

- RESTEASY-2946 upgrade jackson to 2.12.3 
- RESTEASY-2945 upgrade spring-boot to 2.5.1 
- RESTEASY-2944 upgrade resteasy to 4.6.1.Final

name: v3.8.0.Final
body:
In this release:

-  RESTEASY-2827 - Cleanup javax.validation:validation-api dependency
-  RESTEASY-2839 upgrade resteasy to 3.15.0.Final

name: v4.7.0.Final
body:
In this release:

- Upgrade RESTEasy to 4.6.0.Final

name: v3.7.0.Final
body:
In this reelase:

- resteasy.ver = 3.14.0.Final
- spring.ver = 2.4.0
- jackson.ver = 2.10.5

name: v3.6.3.Final
body:
In this release:

- RESTEASY-2788 - upgrade resteasy to 3.14.0.Final
- RESTEASY-2789 - RESTEasy compatibility information for Spring Boot 2.3.6
- RESTEASY-2790 - upgrade jackson to 2.10.5 (#94)

name: v4.6.3.Final
body:
In this release:

resteasy.ver = 4.5.7.Final

Please do not use this release, because RESTEasy `4.5.8.Final` will be included in the next release.

name: v4.5.1.Final
body:
In this release:

- Jackson upgraded to `2.10.3`
- RESTEasy upgraded to `4.5.3.Final`

name: v3.4.0.Final
body:
In this release:

-  RESTEasy upgraded to `3.11.2.Final`
- Jackson2  upgraded to `2.10.3`

name: v4.5.0.Final
body:
In this release:

- RESTEasy dependency version upgraded to `4.5.1.Final`

name: v4.4.0.Final
body: In this release, `springboot.version` is upgraded to `2.2.2.RELEASE`.

In this release:

- RESTEASY-2447 upgrade spring-boot to 2.1.10.RELEASE

name: v3.3.1.Final
body:
In this release:

- RESTEASY-2420 upgrade resteasy dep to 3.9.1.Final

name: v4.3.1.Final
body:
In this Release:

- RESTEASY-2416  upgrade resteasy dependency to 4.4.1.Final

name: v4.3.0.Final
body:
In this release:

- RESTEASY-2394 - upgrade resteasy to 4.4.0.Final

name: v4.2.0.Final
body:
This release includes:

- RESTEASY-2374 - upgrade spring-boot to 2.2.0.RELEASE (#42)
- RESTEASY-2373 - Upgrade Jackson2 to 2.10.0 (#40)
- RESTEASY-2359 - remove cobertura plugin from resteasy-spring-boot (#38)
- RESTEASY-2365 - Support for scanning of resources and providers that are not spring beans (#37)

name: v3.3.0.Final
body:
This release includes:

- RESTEASY-2352 - Upgrade Jackson2 to 2.9.10 (#33)
- RESTEASY-2365 - Support for scanning of resources and providers that are not spring beans
- RESTEASY-2359 - remove cobertura plugin from resteasy-spring-boot
- RESTEASY-2373 - Upgrade Jackson2 to 2.10.0 (#41)
- RESTEASY-2374 - upgrade spring-boot to 2.2.0.RELEASE (#43)
